thi-ap9:14.1: Parammukhā nisīditvā → puratthābhimukhā santi (s2, s3) | puratthābhimukhā ṭhitā (pts1)
thi-ap9:18.3: Mātukucchigatā santī → mātukucchigataṃ santiṃ (bj) | mātu kucchigataṃ santaṃ (s2, s3)
thi-ap9:19.3: sūtikāgehe → sūtighare pajjalanti (bj, pts1) | sūtighareva jalanti (s2, s3)
thi-ap9:22.3: vasantiyā → ca jhāyanyantyā (bj) | ca jhāyante (si) | pajjhāyantā (s2, s3) | ca jhāyantā (pts1)
